item.title: FFMPEG And It's Java Binding JavaCV
item.description: This Article introduces ffmpeg and it’s java binding JavaCV Concept and Structure title: transcoding process rectangle "input file" as input rectangle encoded [encoded data packets] rectangle decoded [decoded frames] rectangle encoded_data [encoded data packets] rectangle output [output file] input -right-> encoded: demuxer encoded-right-> decoded: decoder decoded -down-> encoded_data: encoder encoded_data -left-> output: muxer library libavformat library provides a generic framework for multiplexing and demultiplexing (muxing and demuxing) audio,video and subtitle streams.
